import "./style.css"; import Hero from "../components/Hero"; import Button from "../components/Button"; import { useState, Fragment } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-grid-system"; import strings from "../strings.json"; import questions from "../questions.json"; export default () => { const [step, setStep] = useState("form"); function handleNextStep(stepNumber) { return function () { setStep(stepNumber); } } return
{strings.english.Header.OurMission} {strings.english.Header.Terms}
{step === "form" &&

{strings.english.Hero.title}

{strings.english.Hero.subtitle}

} {step === "bank" &&

{questions.Bank.title}

{}

} {step === "name_and_id" &&

Full Name & ID Number

This information is required for the bank form.

} {step === 3 &&

Do you want to delay all mortgages in your account?

This information is required for the bank form.

}

{strings.english.OurMission.title}

{strings.english.OurMission.p1}

{strings.english.OurMission.p2}

CoronaForms {strings.english.OurMission.p3}
CoronaForms.org {new Date().getFullYear()}
{strings.english.Footer.MadeWithLoveInIsrael}
}
